title: X+M Forever: A Maid in Lace Bonus Chapter
description: “I love you so much, Xander Hawke. I don't know where I'd be without you.”   Five years of marriage, Xander and Milania already have a precious family in their midst. As their family gone out for a picnic, they stumble upon a memory carved into the table, and they began to reminisce their whole story.  Now, Xander and Milania are looking forward to another addition to their family. But unlike before, they are ready.   Xander and Milania has gone through rough times, and this happy ending nearly did not come true. Grab a copy of the epilogue to R. Roe’s steamy “Maid in Lace.”
author: R.  Roe
